Package org.moeaframework.analysis.sensitivity

Class SimpleStatistics

java.lang.Object
org.moeaframework.util.CommandLineUtility
org.moeaframework.analysis.sensitivity.SimpleStatistics
public class SimpleStatistics extends CommandLineUtility
Command line utility for computing statistics across multiple data files. The data files should only contain numeric values, and each file must contain the same number of rows and columns.

Usage: java -cp "..." org.moeaframework.analysis.sensitivity.SimpleStatistics <options> <files>

Arguments:

-m, --mode The mode of operation, such as minimum, maximum, average, stdev, or count (required).
-o, --output Location where the output is saved. If not given, the output is printed to the console.
-i, --ignore Ignore infinite or NaN values.
-x, --maximum The value used to replace any infinity values. If infinity values are not replaced, some calculations, such as the average, can be skewed.
<files> The files to analyze.

      public org.apache.commons.cli.Options getOptions()
      Description copied from class: CommandLineUtility
